testcase.name: ShouldNotBeAbleToCreateAPlaylistWithExpiredToken
testcase.system-out:
Request method: POST Request URI: https://api.spotify.com/v1/users/31xxj6sy7e2cornflo4cnsygfsyu/playlists Proxy: <none> Request params: <none> Query params: <none> Form params: <none> Path params: <none> Headers: Authorization=Bearer 12345 Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: <none> Multiparts: <none> Body: { "description": "New playlist description", "name": "New Playlist", "public": false } HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized www-authenticate: Bearer realm="spotify", error="invalid_token", error_description="Invalid access token" access-control-allow-origin: * access-control-allow-headers: Accept, App-Platform, Authorization, Content-Type, Origin, Retry-After, Spotify-App-Version, X-Cloud-Trace-Context, client-token, content-access-token access-control-allow-methods: GET, POST, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE, PATCH access-control-allow-credentials: true access-control-max-age: 604800 content-type: application/json content-encoding: gzip strict-transport-security: max-age=31536000 x-content-type-options: nosniff date: Fri, 21 Oct 2022 07:43:14 GMT server: envoy Via: HTTP/2 edgeproxy, 1.1 google Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=2592000,h3-29=":443"; ma=2592000 Transfer-Encoding: chunked
{ "error": { "status": 401, "message": "Invalid access token" } }
